From: KSLawdogg@...

Random Otyebis Crew Members:





Epyon's and Hot Rod's messages were received and recorded into the vast 
library, scans of the sources of the transmissions matched the location of 
Iron Raptor's base provided by the three bounty hunters that had been 
captured, which most likely meant all the rest was true as well.  This 
information was relayed to the President and Vice-President of the IGL.

An unimportant crewman sent  reply transmissions directly to the two Maximals 
acknowledging Epyon's entrance as well as Hot Rod's.  The message was as 
follows:

For Epyon:

"Thank you Epyon for entering the Intergalactic Gladiatorial League's Regular 
League.  There will be a waiting period of two weeks (fourteen days counting 
June 22nd) for other sentient beings to enter into the contest.  You will be 
notified when the first matches begin.  Good luck."

For Hot Rod:

"Thank you, Hot Rod, for entering the IGL's Regular League.  There will be 
two weeks until the first matches, in which time other people can enter and 
then the fights can begin.  If you know of anyone who would be interested in 
participating, go ahead and urge them on.  Good luck."
